document_data.name: Tar Hurara
document_data.home: [[Priapurl]], [[Dragon Coast]]{{Cite web/More Lake of Steam and Dragon Coast}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Tar Hurara''' was a [[human]] [[fighter]] and the leader of the town of [[Priapurl]] on the [[Dragon Coast]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: Hurara was descended from bandits but she sought to reach true nobility. She was known as a wastrel and spent most of her time at the court of [[Cormyr]] rather than in Priapurl.
